About Me

Frontend Developer

Hello there!, my name is Johnson Jide, a self taught web developer and Email template developer, i hold bachelor's degree in Mathematics and Computer science, and Master of Art. I'm presently working on personal projects and partial internship working on react project.

I have experience working with HTML, CSS, SCSS, BOOTSTRAP, JAVASCRIPT, REACTJS, GIT and learning to work with NEXTJS currently. I can take your FIGMA design and turn them to reality
